documentation.author: CERNER
documentation.purpose: Select outcome nomen for goals based on auto populated and manually documented responses surrounding documentation about why statin medication therapy was not prescribed at discharge.
documentation.explanation: Select the outcome nomen of Goal not met for the Reg Discharged on Statin Medication Goal if the manually documented response to the Reg STK Doc Statin Not Given Disch DTA is No; auto populate nomen responses for the Reg STK Reason Statin Not Given Disch vA DTA based on system data; select an outcome nomen for Reg Discharged on Statin Medication Goal based on the manually documented and auto populated response(s) for Reg STK Reason Statin Not Given Disch vA DTA.
documentation.impact:
The following needs to be addressed at each client site:
All order details need to be reinstantiated
All scripts need to be included in any environment that this rule is to run in
ALL ACTIONS
VALUE1 needs to be reinstantiated
documentation.keywords: Powerform QM STK 2 3 6 Discharge Medications v3 1 Stroke Quality Measures PowerPlan 1 Statins

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALLERGY_E
templateDefinitions.definition: Allergy action is ACTION_TYPE and allergy ALLERGY_QUAL OPT_ALLERGY for OPT_CATEGORY category with reaction OPT_REACTION_QUAL OPT_REACTION and OPT_REACTION_TYPE, OPT_REACTION_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_INFO_SOURCE, OPT_CANCEL_REASON. Optionally narrow allergy matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALLERGY_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Allergy action is ACTION_TYPE and allergy ALLERGY_QUAL OPT_ALLERGY for OPT_CATEGORY category with reaction OPT_REACTION_QUAL OPT_REACTION and OPT_REACTION_TYPE, OPT_REACTION_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_INFO_SOURCE, OPT_CANCEL_REASON. Optionally narrow allergy matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CODED_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_UNITS_OF_MEASURE on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert. OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.
